title: AI-Driven Science Education Design and Performance Analysis Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of AI concepts and foundational knowledge of Outcome-Based Education (OBE) systems
context.additional_context: Focus on science education design and performance measurement using AI tools in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained settings.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design science education curricula using AI-based instructional design models.
Learners can analyze causal relationships between instructional design and student outcomes through SEM-based quantitative analysis.
Learners can implement AI instructional design applying mobile microlearning in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
